Alberta premier assailed for saying Canada environment minister should be targetedCanadian cabinet members on Thursday condemned the premier of the energy-rich province of Alberta for reportedly saying that Environment Minister Steven Guilbeault should be targeted over his policies. Thu, 25 Jan 2024 20:36:14 GMT DDROWPA6ZZKWDEJO2U6SEDANRA https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/alberta-premier-assailed-saying-canada-environment-minister-should-be-targeted-2024-01-25/Reuters世界美洲
Violence off the table in Venezuela, Guyana border dispute, says officialVenezuela and Guyana have reassured that they will not use violence, threats or involve third parties in their dispute over the Esequibo territory's borders. Thu, 25 Jan 2024 20:16:17 GMT YB5QPEANNNJM7M2KOLFE6HTDDY https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/violence-off-table-venezuela-guyana-border-dispute-says-official-2024-01-25/Reuters世界美洲
Kuwait foils plot to attack Shi'ite places of worship -state news agencyKuwait's interior ministry on Thursday foiled a plan by a militant cell to attack Shi'ite Muslim places of worship, state news agency (KUNA) reported. Thu, 25 Jan 2024 20:02:30 GMT SFSZRVDQN5LKLGCAI5U7YWOZN4 https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/kuwait-foils-terrorist-plan-intended-target-shiite-places-worship-state-news-2024-01-25/Reuters世界中东
Around 20 civilians killed in Congo attack, army and rebels trade blameAround 20 civilians were killed in an attack in eastern Democratic Republic of Congo on Thursday, the army and M23 rebels said, accusing each other of launching the assault. Thu, 25 Jan 2024 19:54:53 GMT NTEQ6GFR2JINFML7MNGKERW57M https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/around-20-civilians-killed-congo-attack-army-rebels-trade-blame-2024-01-25/Reuters世界非洲
UN urges measures to stop arms trafficking fueling Haiti's gang warsThe head of the United Nation's drugs and crime office on Thursday warned of a "vicious cycle" of arms trafficking to increasingly powerful Haitian gangs, fueling an internal conflict and worsening violence across the Caribbean. Thu, 25 Jan 2024 19:51:59 GMT 4E3A2DNXGJNFXM7KMO63NC35WQ https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/un-urges-measures-stop-arms-trafficking-fueling-haitis-gang-wars-2024-01-25/Sarah Morland世界美洲
Ecuador police destroy over 20 metric tons of cocaineEcuadorean Police on Thursday destroyed some 21.5 metric tons of cocaine which they seized over the weekend as part of a military offensive declared by the government to combat organized crime. Thu, 25 Jan 2024 19:42:02 GMT R4V4XZWGJZNXPOPLHXVFCC6SKA https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/ecuador-police-destroy-over-20-metric-tons-cocaine-2024-01-25/Reuters世界美洲
Turkey's Erdogan signs off on Sweden's NATO membership ratificationTurkish President Tayyip Erdogan on Thursday signed off on the parliament's ratification of Sweden's NATO membership bid, the presidency's official gazette showed, marking the final step in Ankara's approval of Stockholm into the alliance. Thu, 25 Jan 2024 19:30:36 GMT AILVSMD7LJLLPBXBBR7GLNZ76Q https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/turkeys-erdogan-signs-off-swedens-nato-membership-ratification-2024-01-25/Reuters世界中东
WHO chief breaks down describing 'hellish' Gaza conditionsThe head of the World Health Organization called for a ceasefire and a "true solution" to the Israel-Palestinian conflict in an emotional plea to the global health body's governing body on Thursday where he described conditions in Gaza as "hellish". Thu, 25 Jan 2024 18:07:20 GMT FP3KWF7S7FL6XIKAKWMGXME2L4 https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/who-chief-breaks-down-describing-hellish-gaza-conditions-2024-01-25/Reuters世界中东
US warned Iran of 'terrorist threat' before Jan. 3 attack -officialThe U.S. government privately warned long-time antagonist Iran about a "terrorist threat" within its borders ahead of a deadly attack this month that was claimed by the Islamic State militant group, a U.S. official said on Thursday. Thu, 25 Jan 2024 17:46:53 GMT KVV5P4D66RJQVBRXKPHLUQZPJE https://www.reuters.com/world/us-privately-warned-iran-about-terrorist-threat-ahead-islamic-state-attack-2024-01-25/Simon Lewis, Arshad Mohammed世界
Heads of Mossad, CIA to meet Qatar PM this weekend to discuss Gaza truce -sourceThe directors of Israel's Mossad intelligence service and the U.S. Central Intelligence Agency will meet Qatar's prime minister in Europe this weekend to discuss a ceasefire in the Gaza Strip and release of hostages, an official briefed on the meeting told Reuters on Thursday. Thu, 25 Jan 2024 17:32:34 GMT 4ZRVASYQ4NMGNAEU2V74OSSSF4 https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/heads-mossad-cia-meet-qatar-pm-this-weekend-discuss-gaza-truce-source-2024-01-25/Reuters世界中东
Climate worries begin early in Iberia as January heats upSpring temperatures in the middle of Spain's winter lured people to beaches and outdoor cafes on Thursday - but even those enjoying the unusually warm weather voiced concerns about climate change and the threat of new heatwaves. Thu, 25 Jan 2024 16:32:46 GMT 6AEZPLLIYZKIZBDD23UEZBK26E https://www.reuters.com/business/environment/climate-worries-begin-early-iberia-january-heats-up-2024-01-25/Reuters可持续发展气候与能源
